attributes.action: Call an election on Wednesday 26th June 2007 to take place on Thursday 19th July 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a democracy, and with a change of leadership taking place on the 27th June,  we the undersigned feel that it is only proper that Tony Blair calls a General  Election on the 26th June 2007 with the election to take place 3 weeks later on the 19th July 2007.  This will give the country a chance to validate Gordon Brown as Prime Minister as soon as possible.
